Uses of Class
pluginlib.PreferenceWidget

Uses of PreferenceWidget in pluginlib
 

Subclasses of PreferenceWidget in pluginlib
static class PreferenceWidget.BooleanWidget
          This class implements a PropertyWidget for a boolean-valued property, associating it with a check-box Button in the UI.
static class PreferenceWidget.ChoiceWidget
          A UI widget that offers a selection from a fixed set of strings, corresponding to a ChoiceOption.
static class PreferenceWidget.FileWidget
          This class implements an OptionWidget for a text field property that holds a file name, using the FileTextField widget, which incorporates a Browse button.
static class PreferenceWidget.Label
          This class implements an PreferenceWidget that is a Label, so that it can sit in lists of PreferenceWidgets.
 

Fields in pluginlib declared as PreferenceWidget
static PreferenceWidget[] PreferencePage.eclipseOptions
          This is the list of widgets in the JmlEclipse options section of the properties page
 

Methods in pluginlib that return PreferenceWidget
protected abstract  PreferenceWidget[] PreferencePage.options()
          This method must be overridden to return an array of OptionWidget that the other methods here are to act upon.
 

Methods in pluginlib with parameters of type PreferenceWidget
 void PreferencePage.addWidgets(PreferenceWidget[] ws, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite composite)
          Calls 'addWidget' on all the items in the list of OptionWidgets, in order to add them to the given composite.
 void PreferencePage.addWidgets(PreferenceWidget[] ws, int offset, int num, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite composite)
          Calls 'addWidget' on some of the items in the list of OptionWidgets, in order to add them to the given composite.
 void PreferencePage.setDefaults(PreferenceWidget[] ws)
          Calls setDefault for each widget in the list
 void PreferencePage.setOptionValue(PreferenceWidget[] ws)
          Calls 'setOptionValue' on all the items in the array
